summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates image‑to‑text pipelines across multiple model architectures and frameworks, checking generation quality, conditional generation, batching consistency, and behavior of both small and large models.
business_intent: Ensure the robustness and correctness of image‑to‑text services before release, guaranteeing they work with different back‑ends (PyTorch, TensorFlow), support conditional prompts, handle various model sizes, and maintain consistent performance for end‑users.
